items.title: America’s child care crunch is keeping parents from running for public office because they simply ‘cannot make it all work,’ state senator says
items.description: Stephanie Chang said she used to race across the state with her baby so she could make 9 a.m. committee meetings at the state Capitol.

items.title: Private hiring slowed in April out of fear of tariff impacts. ‘Unease is the word of the day,’ ADP chief economist says
items.description: These job gains were even lower than economists had expected.

items.title: Stock markets tank on bad GDP news as Trump puts blame on ‘Biden’s stock market’
items.description: Dow falls more than 750 at one point.

items.title: Microsoft says it will ‘vigorously’ contest any government orders to halt cloud operations in Europe: ‘If we ever find ourselves losing we will put in place business continuity arrangements’
items.description: European leaders are alarmed about Trump's policy changes that throw into doubt his administration's commitment to the trans-Atlantic relationship.

items.title: How much deterioration in the world’s largest economy could be traced to Trump’s policies? ‘All of it,’ one economist says
items.description: GDP and hiring have both sunk as a result of Trump upending decades of American trade policy.
